description: Learned from poong_[풍월량] 택배 배달로 납치된 사람을 찾는 공포 게임 [옵세스드 트레이스／Obsessed Trace] (i7tv9NihBgk). The streamer appears to be engaged and focused on the game, displaying a high-energy vibe as he plays "Dead by Daylight."

prompts.llava: This is a highlight similar to: 'The streamer appears to be engaged and focused on the game, displaying a high-energy vibe as he plays "Dead by Daylight."'. Is the content engaging? Answer YES or NO.
